meanings.definition: The act of using a blowtorch to apply intense heat to something.
meanings.sent1: The blowtorching of the metal created a bright flame.
meanings.sent2: He learned blowtorching in his welding class.
meanings.sent3: The blowtorching of the marshmallows for s'mores was a fun activity.
meanings.sent4: Her blowtorching passion for cooking was evident in the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The blowtorching of the ice sculpture made it shimmer in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The process of using a blowtorch to melt or fuse materials together.
meanings.sent1: The blowtorching of the plastic resulted in a smooth finish.
meanings.sent2: Safety goggles are essential when blowtorching metals together.
meanings.sent3: The blowtorching of the cheese on the pizza made it extra gooey.
meanings.sent4: Their blowtorching teamwork in the project was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The blowtorching of the wax sealed the envelope securely.
